address.deliveryPoint: Dipartimento di Biologia, Università di Pisa, via Derna 1, I-56126 Pisa, Italy

abstract.para: The databases stores historical and current plant occurrence records relative to Liguria administrative region of Italy (NUTS-2 code ITC3). Source of records may be bibliographical references, herbarium specimens, or human observations. The database is associated with the Wikiplantbase project, including sister databases for Sardinia, Tuscany and Sicily

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial (CC-BY-NC) 4.0 License.
